fields.name: Local authority
fields.description: Local authority responsible for the library service

fields.name: Library name
fields.description: Full public name by which the library is known

fields.name: Count start
fields.description: The start date of the count.

fields.name: Count end
fields.description: The end date of the count.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of event. For individual events this could be the name.

fields.name: Outcome
fields.description: The intended outcome from the event. One of a set of predefined outcomes.

enum: Helping everyone achieve their full potential

fields.name: Events
fields.description: The number of events of this type held in the counting period.

fields.name: Attendees
fields.description: The number of attendees in total (adults and children) for these events.
